metadata.title: HTML Canvas
metadata.intro: This HTML  Canvas quick reference cheat sheet lists the common HTML5  Canvas design tags in readable layout.

cards.title: Basic Setup
cards.body:
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Canvas Example</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <canvas
      id="myCanvas"
      width="500"
      height="400"
      style="border:1px solid #000000;"
    ></canvas>
    <script src="script.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>
```

cards.title: Getting the Context
Rectangles
Lines
cards.body:
```js
ctx.beginPath();
ctx.moveTo(50, 50); // Starting point
ctx.lineTo(200, 50); // Ending point
ctx.lineTo(200, 200); // Next line ending point
ctx.closePath(); // Connects the end point to the start point
ctx.stroke();
```
